title: How to help a teammate who is behind
body:
#DOs
- Let them get some extra gold here and there (like from smaller jungle camps and objective bonuses)
- Donate a kill or two 
- Allow them to get at least an assist if possible
- Allow them to farm a bit if their CS is low
- Help them in lane with roams and/or ganks (sometimes a few repeated ganks if they are successful)
- Call MIAs and often, spam it if needed or send/spam warning pings

#DON'Ts
- Farm their lane's minions when they are there
- Push their lane if they are freezing it
- Abandon them and/or leave them to fend for themselves (just keep an eye out for roams or ganks and help out if you can)
- Do not try and put all the resources into 4 players (almost a 100% guaranteed loss if you do this since you just end up making it a 4v5)
- Refuse to gank/roam to their lane (most times they are just too passive to contest their lane but a gank/roam could help them out a lot)
